kickstart.post: /opt/stack/bin/stack report host route &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; | \ /opt/stack/bin/stack report script attrs="`/opt/stack/bin/stack report host attr &Kickstart_PrivateHostname; pydict=true`" | /bin/bash
